_source.text: 79 times capped England legend Rio Ferdinand was again passed over for a useless crock, who it's thought will fit into the team much better because of his rare ability of not wanting to kill John Terry.

text: 79 times capped England legend Rio **Ferdinand** was **again** **passed** over for a useless crock, who it's
thought will fit into the team much **better** **because** of his rare ability of not wanting to kill John Terry.
